home.heroTitle: The End to End Retail Media Suite That Gets Results
home.heroDesc: Join the leading companies that use Raneen One to power their retail media network and earn more revenue than their competition with custom ad formats, unique data targeting, and AI campaign management.
home.audienceDesc: Our audience segmentation tool harnesses your first-party data into a single customer view for AI-powered segmentation, audience activation, and ad personalization. Push segments anywhere in your network, onsite or offsite.
home.consoleDesc: Our out-of-the-box omnichannel campaign management user interface with AI automation features and self-service capabilities to help you scale your retail media network from day one.

navbar.apiQuickstartDesc: Test the API in just minutes
navbar.blogDesc: Articles about Raneen One and the industry
navbar.adServerGuideDesc: All there is to know about ad servers

footer.inboxTitle: All ad tech in your inbox
footer.inboxDesc: Stay up to date with the latest news.

footerCTA.title: Ready to get started?
footerCTA.desc: Talk to one of our experts today. Learn how The Retail Media Cloud® can supercharge your retail media network or review our documentation.

contactModal.title: Talk to an expert
contactModal.desc: Learn more about how Raneen One can support your ad business with a 30 minute introductory call.
contactModal.hasAdPlatform: Do you already have an existing ad platform?
contactModal.describeYou: Which one of these best describes you?*
contactModal.anythingElse: Anything else you would like to share?
contactModal.consent: I consent to marketing communications from Raneen One.

projectShowcase.sectionTitle: Solutions for every type of business

retail.title: Retail
retail.desc: Make the most of your unique first-party data and omnichannel experience to give your advertisers and results they can't get anywhere else.
retail.testimonial: By utilizing Raneen One's flexible, API-based solution, we have enacted the basis for scalability and advancement of our Retail Media network while enhancing our ability to create custom ad experiences that resonate with our customers.
retail.author: Natalie Ong, Director of DG Media Network Operations (Dollar General)

marketplaces.title: Marketplaces
marketplaces.desc: Empower your marketplace with advanced targeting and monetization tools to maximize value for both sellers and buyers.
marketplaces.testimonial: Raneen One enabled us to scale our ad platform and deliver more relevant ads to our marketplace users.
marketplaces.author: Jane Doe, Head of Monetization (Etsy)

finance.title: Finance
finance.desc: Leverage secure, privacy-first ad solutions to reach your customers with the right financial products at the right time.
finance.testimonial: With Raneen One, we can deliver compliant, relevant offers to our users and drive engagement.
finance.author: John Smith, Digital Marketing Lead (PayPal)

travel.title: Travel
travel.desc: Connect travelers with personalized offers and experiences across every touchpoint in their journey.
travel.testimonial: Raneen One's platform lets us deliver the right message to the right traveler at the right time.
travel.author: Emily Chen, VP of Marketing (Expedia)

delivery.title: Delivery Apps
delivery.desc: Boost engagement and revenue with targeted promotions and seamless ad experiences for your delivery app users.
delivery.testimonial: We've seen a significant lift in campaign performance and user retention since using Raneen One.
delivery.author: Carlos Rivera, Growth Manager (iFood)

adDonut.sectionTitle:
The lifecycle of an ad through
the Retail Media Cloud<sup>TM</sup>
adDonut.sectionDesc: The Retail Media Cloud brings together the power of ad serving and machine-learning powered audience targeting to launch unique onsite ad formats. Retailers can easily:

create.label: Create
create.title: ManagementAPI
create.desc: Create unique, scalable, and performance-driven ads and campaigns via the Management API and Catalog.

segment.label: Segment
segment.title: Audience
segment.desc: Create custom first-party data segments to captivate the right audiences using Audience or your own machine learning models.

forecast.label: Forecast
forecast.title: ForecastAPI
forecast.desc: Accurately predict performance to drive efficient ad sales, maximizing your inventory yield management.

launch.label: Launch
launch.title: DecisionAPI
launch.desc: Power ad selection based on creative data, auctions, and targeting.

report.label: Report
report.title: ReportingAPI
report.desc: Analyze and report on campaign results.

successStories.title: Success stories
successStories.subtitle: See how companies harness the power of ad serving APIs.

slides.quote: Predictive segments powered by machine-learning models have become very important for us as client’s display different behaviors depending on the category with varying frequency of purchase and consideration periods.
slides.author: Judit Takács Miranda, Head of Digital Marketing

slides.quote: Raneen One enabled us to scale our ad platform and deliver more relevant ads to our marketplace users.
slides.author: Jane Doe, Head of Monetization

slides.quote: With Raneen One, we can deliver compliant, relevant offers to our users and drive engagement.
slides.author: John Smith, Digital Marketing Lead

slides.quote: Raneen One’s platform lets us deliver the right message to the right traveler at the right time.
slides.author: Emily Chen, VP of Marketing

delivery.heroTitle: Report your ad campaigns your way
delivery.heroDesc: Raneen One makes sure you get the information you (and your advertisers) need.
delivery.centerDesc: Marketplaces like yours require an ad platform that offers flexibility, transparency, and speed. Our API-first Retail Media Cloud® provides this and more.

card1.title: Security
card1.desc: Eliminate on-site JavaScript ad tags that slow load times.

card2.title: Enhanced user experience
card2.desc: Inserted ads use the same CSS and layout as your organic content, creating a seamless user experience.

card3.title: Improved site performance
card3.desc: Tougher for ad blockers to identify and block your ads, enabling you to monetize 30%-40% more users.

delivery.gradientTitle:
Offset low margins with a
high-margin ad platform
delivery.gradientDesc: Delivery apps can have low margins, so the delivery giants like DoorDash and Instacart monetize with custom ad platforms. Raneen One can help you build what they built in a fraction of the time and cost without sacrificing security or user experience.
delivery.gradientImgAlt: Monthly cost by impression volume graph

stories.quote: Raneen One has enabled us to rapidly scale, growing monthly iFood Delivery ad revenue by 20x in a single year.
stories.author: Lucas Sampaio, Senior Business Intelligence Analyst, iFood

stories.quote: Our partnership with Raneen One allowed us to launch new ad products in record time.
stories.author: Sarah Lee, Product Manager, Mercado Libre

stories.quote: With Raneen One, we increased our ad fill rate and improved user experience across the board.
stories.author: Ahmed Hassan, CTO, Noon

financial.heroTitle: Launch your privacy-first financial media network
financial.heroDesc: With world-class security and privacy features built-in by default, you can focus your efforts on scaling your ad business.
financial.centerDesc: Marketplaces like yours require an ad platform that offers flexibility, transparency, and speed. Our API-first Retail Media Cloud® provides this and more.

feature1.label: SMARTER PERSONALIZATION
feature1.title: Server-side ad serving for security, user experience, and improved site performance
feature1.desc: Eliminate on-site JavaScript ad tags that slow load times. Ads are inserted directly into your content management system, with ads using the same CSS and layout as your organic content, creating a seamless user experience. Tougher for ad blockers to identify and block your ads, enabling you to monetize 30%-40% more users.

financial.gradientTitle: Don't leave a high-margin, multi-million dollar business on the table.
financial.gradientDesc: Supplement your core business and bear the competition with a high-margin ad platform. Do it with a partner that lets you keep your margin so you can grow even fasters, unshackled from revenue shares.
financial.gradientImgAlt: Monthly cost by impression volume graph

stories.quote: Raneen One has enabled us to rapidly scale, growing monthly iFood Delivery ad revenue by 20x in a single year.
stories.author: Lucas Sampaio, Senior Business Intelligence Analyst, iFood

stories.quote: Our partnership with Raneen One allowed us to launch new ad products in record time.
stories.author: Sarah Lee, Product Manager, Mercado Libre

stories.quote: With Raneen One, we increased our ad fill rate and improved user experience across the board.
